description: Radford Chiropractic Clinic, LLC is your local Chiropractor in Radford serving all of your needs. Call us today at (540) 731-3842 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Radford Chiropractic Clinic, LLC Your Radford Chiropractor For more information or to schedule an appointment with Dr. Cooley, call (540) 731-3842 today! Dr. Philip Cooley is a chiropractor and acupuncturist serving Radford and the surrounding communities. Dr. Cooley and the rest of the staff at Radford Chiropractic Clinic, LLC are dedicated to chiropractic solutions to target your unique needs. Whether you are suffering from back pain, neck pain, headaches or sports injuries, we are here to help. You may need pain relief after suffering an accident, experiencing an injury, or if you have a specific condition such as chronic back pain or a spinal condition; or if your goal is wellness care, Dr. Cooley can help you achieve your wellness goals! Please visit the testimonials page to see what our patients are saying about our Radford chiropractor and getting regular chiropractic treatments. At your first visit to Radford Chiropractic Clinic, LLC, Dr. Philip Cooley will explain the science behind how chiropractic care works, and give you a full evaluation to see if chiropractic care is right for you. If chiropractic care or acupuncture is appropriate for your condition it, Dr. Cooley will develop a care plan that is specific to your condition and health goals. If you have not been to a chiropractor before and want to find out more, please [contact us](/contact) or call (540) 731-3842 to receive the answers to your questions from our experienced team. We also welcome referrals, so we invite you to share our chiropractic and wellness information with your friends and loved ones. If you would like to stay informed about the latest in chiropractic care or if you want to start receiving free articles about health and wellness news, subscribe to our bi-weekly newsletter, even if you are not a patient. We also offer a community content area, which includes wellness articles and other healthcare resources. "Observational study found that low back pain patients receiving chiropractic care, which typically includes spinal manipulation, are more satisfied than those receiving medical care." -New England Journal of Medicine Our purpose is get people better, everyday.
